module.title: Building with Tailwind
module.description: Build real UI components: cards, navbars, forms, and more

lessons.title: Cards & Buttons
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Cards: `border rounded-lg p-6 shadow` + content inside
- Buttons: `px-4 py-2 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-600`
- Hover states: `hover:` prefix
- Transitions: `transition-colors duration-200`

lessons.title: Navigation Bars
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Flexbox for layout: `flex items-center justify-between`
- Sticky nav: `sticky top-0 z-50`
- Mobile hamburger with `hidden md:flex`
- Active states with conditional classes

lessons.title: Styled Forms
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Input: `w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500`
- Label: `block text-sm font-bold mb-1`
- Focus states: `focus:` prefix
- Ring utility for focus outlines

---

# Styled Forms

lessons.title: Transitions & Animations
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `transition` enables smooth changes
- `duration-200`, `duration-300` control speed
- `hover:scale-105` for zoom effect
- `animate-spin`, `animate-pulse`, `animate-bounce` built-in
- `transform` utilities: `scale`, `rotate`, `translate`
